info.title: RuNu Url
info.description: RuGu Short Url API Set Custom Passwors, Set Date to expire, Set Max Clicks, Set Custom Url etc. with Metro Controls. Easy to use Short URL API. Presented by http://sphirelabs.com/.

parameters.name: &custom
parameters.description: Set Custom Name e.x. fb for facebook gives url runu.ga/fb

parameters.name: &expire
parameters.description: Set date in format MM/DD/YYYY to expire url.

parameters.name: &password
parameters.description: Set a Custom Password to unlock the short url. Note: Maximum 10 chars.

parameters.name: &uses
parameters.description: Set Number of uses for the url.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Url of the website to short url.
